name: Groth
description:
HOW TO PLAY: Stand in the center of your playspace and smash things that try to chain you down.  You have to swing your controller hard enough to properly smash, but once things get out of reach accept your fate (don't dive into your TV!) Have fun!!

CREDITS: The perfect score and sound effects were created by Francis Roberts. Also thanks to Dan Colman for some help with programming.

LORE:

That sensation… Familiar, isn’t it?

Your presence is required again. It’s been a thousand mortal lifetimes since you’ve had a body of your own, but this time it’s not just an empty shell; It’s a strong, dynamic body. One with potential.

The priests thought they were getting closer to their God. Fools! They’re speaking to something much older, and it’s finally listening.

You can hear them.

You can feel their world.

You are regaining consciousness.

You are gathering strength.

You will take what is yours, and destroy their pitiful world.

You are their new savior, from a time before the sun shone light into their pitiful world.

You are Gröth.
